valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 26 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low east FitzRoy 1011 moving slowly southwestwards and losing its identity by 1800 Friday. New low expected Trafalgar 1008 by same time. High southeast Fair Isle 1039 dissipating

FitzRoy.text:

In south, cyclonic 4 to 6. In north, easterly or northeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first.

Weather
Thundery showers.

Moderate or good, occasionally poor.
